channel.title: Blog on Ali Orouji
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Ali Orouji

item.title: My Journey so far - Part 1
item.description: I got my first computer when I was 12, but did nothing with it but to play video games until I was 14. In that time, there was a growing culture of blogging among Iranian youth and I also created my own blog on a local blogging platform (Blogfa) to write about things like video games, tech news, etc. Needing to customize the appearance and functionality of my blog, I became familiar with HTML and Javascript.
